narrative:
No non-compliant items identified during this inspection.
This inspection and exit briefing were conducted with the owner.
The applicant has met the licensing requirements and wants to be licensed as a Class "A" Dealer.
Licensing fee must be mailed to:
USDA, APHIS, Animal Care
2150 Centre Ave, Bldg B Mail Stop 3W11
Fort Collins, CO  80526-8117 
No regulated activities allowed until a license certificate is obtained.
